# sleepAppHA

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/mdt-ds/sleepAppHA/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/mdt-ds/sleepAppHA/actions)

sleepAppHA is a package developed as a homework assignment for Gradient Metrics hiring process

## Installation

You can install the current version of sleepAppHA from  [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github(
  "mdt-ds/sleepAppHA", 
  upgrade = 'never', 
  build_vignettes = TRUE, 
  repos = "https://cran.rstudio.com/"
)
```
